tooltip: Select Lana as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Lana focuses on protecting your units from enemy Mages and other magic attacks.
Allows you to summon Lana, a Melee Mage Hero that can push enemies with her cane and summon protective magics.
Lana can train Acolytes, Infantry Swordsman that can attack from range with their magic blades.
Captains are replaced by Mage Captains, but can no longer be upgraded into Generals.
Lana can upgrade the magic armor of all units.
